content.html: If you are working on a large JS project run $> npx unimported It will tell you what dependencies are not being used in your code. In my case I found 5 npm modules and over 20 React components that were no longer part of the UI ðŸ¤¯
content.value:
If you are working on a large JS project run

$> npx unimported

It will tell you what dependencies are not being used in your code.

In my case I found 5 npm modules and over 20 React components that were no longer part of the UI ðŸ¤¯
